text: Candied violet milkshake Place the glasses into the freezer to chill for 15 minutes.  Keep aside a few crystallised violets for decoration. Add the rest to the food processor and process until they form a fine powder. Pour the chilled milk into the processor, along with the ice cubes. Process on high until the mixture takes on a creamy texture. Pour the violet milkshake into the chilled glasses.  Sprinkle the remaining crystallised violets on the top of each milkshake for decoration. Add a straw and it's ready to serve. Blueberry violet milkshake Put the ingredients into the blender. Leave a few violet flowers out for decoration. Blend to combine. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall serving glass. Float a few violet flowers on top for garnish.
